io.sphere.sdk.client

Interface SphereAccessTokenSupplier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String>>

    public interface SphereAccessTokenSupplier
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String>>
    Provides an OAuth token for accessing protected Sphere HTTP API endpoints. There a no guarantees concerning the token providing mechanism.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String> get()
      Returns the OAuth access token.
      static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofAutoRefresh(SphereAuthConfig config, HttpClient httpClient, boolean closeHttpClient)
      Provides a token generator which tries to always provide a valid token.
      static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofConstantToken(java.lang.String token)
      Provides a token generator which just returns a fixed token, so the client is only usable for the live time of this token.
      static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofOneTimeFetchingToken(SphereAuthConfig config, HttpClient httpClient, boolean closeHttpClient)
      Provides a token generator which fetches only one token.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String> get()
        Returns the OAuth access token.
        Specified by:
        get in interface java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.lang.String>>

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • ofAutoRefresh

        static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofAutoRefresh(SphereAuthConfig config,
                                               HttpClient httpClient,
                                               boolean closeHttpClient)
        Provides a token generator which tries to always provide a valid token.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to fetch a token
        httpClient - used http client
        closeHttpClient - set to true, if the httpClient should be closed with the created SphereAccessTokenSupplier
        Returns:
        token service

      • ofConstantToken

        static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofConstantToken(java.lang.String token)
        Provides a token generator which just returns a fixed token, so the client is only usable for the live time of this token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token which will be passed to the client
        Returns:
        token service

      • ofOneTimeFetchingToken

        static SphereAccessTokenSupplier ofOneTimeFetchingToken(SphereAuthConfig config,
                                                        HttpClient httpClient,
                                                        boolean closeHttpClient)
        Provides a token generator which fetches only one token. This could be useful for integration tests.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to fetch a token
        httpClient - used http client, will be closed with this generator on close()
        closeHttpClient - set to true, if the httpClient should be closed with the created SphereAccessTokenSupplier
        Returns:
        token service
